title: Corporate Governance Practices of Global Blue Group Holding Ltd

content.text: Global Blue Group Holding Ltd has a diverse board composition with members bringing various expertise and experience to the table. The board consists of individuals from different backgrounds, including finance, technology, and retail. This diversity helps in ensuring a well-rounded decision-making process and reduces the concentration of power.

The company has a significant number of independent directors on its board. Independent directors play a crucial role in ensuring unbiased decision-making and protecting the interests of shareholders. Their presence enhances the transparency and accountability of the company's operations.

Global Blue Group Holding Ltd has established various board committees, such as the audit committee, compensation committee, and nominating and governance committee. These committees assist in overseeing specific aspects of corporate governance and ensure the implementation of best practices. The existence of these committees strengthens the oversight and control functions of the board.

Global Blue Group Holding Ltd follows a structured and performance-based executive compensation framework. The company aligns executive remuneration with the overall financial performance and long-term strategic objectives. This approach helps in motivating executives to drive sustainable growth and create shareholder value. The compensation structure includes a combination of fixed salary, short-term incentives, and long-term incentives, such as stock options or restricted stock units. This incentivization system fosters a link between executive pay and shareholder interests.

Global Blue Group Holding Ltd recognizes the importance of protecting shareholder rights. The company ensures that shareholders have the opportunity to participate in major decisions concerning the company, such as electing directors or approving significant transactions. Shareholders are provided with relevant information in a timely manner and are encouraged to exercise their voting rights. The company's commitment to shareholder rights enhances transparency, accountability, and fairness.
